title: Magnetism - how to increase flux through square

content.question: Which of the following changes will increase the magnitude of the magnetic flux through the loop?

choices.label: Rotating the square about the <math alttext="z" overflow="scroll"><mi>z</mi></math>-axis by <math alttext="45" overflow="scroll"><mn>45</mn></math> degrees.
Rotating the square about the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis by <math alttext="45" overflow="scroll"><mn>45</mn></math> degrees.
Increasing the magnitude of the magnetic field.
Rotating the magnetic field so that the field is in the positive <math alttext="positive y" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></math>-direction.

content.answer: Increasing the magnitude of the magnetic field.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
